## Properties

| Property     | Attribute      | Description                          | Type                                                 | Default     |
| ------------ | -------------- | ------------------------------------ | ---------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `active`     | `active`       | The active site                      | `"community" \| "console" \| "docs" \| "playground"` | `undefined` |
| `debug`      | `debug`        | Boolean to toggle debug mode         | `boolean`                                            | `undefined` |
| `isMenuOpen` | `is-menu-open` | Boolean to track if the menu is open | `boolean`                                            | `false`     |
